alert: ⚠️ Unauthorized Person Detected in Academic Library
recommended_action: Dispatch security officer to the Academic Library immediately. Monitor CAM_LIBRARY live feed. Officer to identify and engage the individual to verify their status and purpose for being in the location.
explanation: An unauthorized individual has been detected with high confidence inside a sensitive location (Academic Library). The priority is elevated to Critical due to the accompanying audio anomaly indicating 'suspicious movement', suggesting a higher risk of theft, vandalism, or other illicit activity.

source_event.description: Detected: 1 person. 1 unauthorized person(s). in Academic Library. Risk factors: Unknown person detected
